long_description: The Garmin VIRB small tube mount makes it easy to attach your VIRB or VIRB Elite action camera to a pole or other small tube to capture your entire adventure. Use the thick or thin insert to make the mount fit perfectly and lock your camera firmly in place. Accommodates tube diameters from 0.35 to 0.95 in.; this small tube mount can be used on anything from ski poles to roll bars. Interlocking joints provide durable, anti-vibration locking performance by gripping in place instead of relying solely on tension.
short_description: The Garmin VIRB small tube mount makes it easy to attach your VIRB or VIRB Elite action camera to a pole or other small tube to capture your entire adventure.
